Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,(##class(%CSP.Response).HyperEventBody()) Write !,"
",! Write "",! Write "
Строки документа",! Write "",! Write !,"" Write !,!,"" Write !,"
",! If '(silent'="true") Goto %csp00001 ;{ Write !,"
" Write !,"
Да
" Write "   " Write !,"
Отмена
" Write "
",! %csp00001 ;} Write !,""

Method.name: OnPageCSPROOT
Method.Implementation: s Kontr=%request.Get("Kontr") s silent=%request.Get("silent") s remdoc=%request.Get("remdoc") i remdoc="" s otchdoc="" e d . s remdocobj=##class(Docs.Remont).%OpenId(remdoc) . s otchdoc=remdocobj.Otchet i $ISOBJECT(otchdoc) s otchdoc=otchdoc.%Id() s edit=%request.Get("edit") Write ! Do ..OnPageHTML()

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>"_($G(%session.Data("systemname")))_"</title>",! Write "<link href=""style.css"" type=text/css rel=stylesheet>" Write !,!,"<script language=""Jscript"" src=""common.js"">" Write "</script>" Write !,"<script language=""JScript"">" Write !,"var Arguments=window.dialogArguments.split(InnerSplitter);",! Write "var ClassName=""Docs.Otchet"";",! Write "window.dialogWidth=screen.availWidth+""px"";",! Write !,"var DocID="""_(otchdoc)_""";",! Write "var remdoc=Arguments[1];",! Write "var DocType=""Отчёт о ремонте"";",! Write "var source="""";",! Write "var Kontr="""_(Kontr)_""";",! Write "var otchdoc="""_(otchdoc)_""";",! Write "var edit="""_(edit)_""";",! Write "if((otchdoc!="""")&&(edit!=""1"")){",! Write " alert(""К данной заявке уже создан отчёт"");",! Write " window.close();",! Write " }",! Write "function load(){",! Write "PropTable.ClassName=ClassName;",! Write "TypDocument.innerText=DocType;",! Write "PropTable.DownLoadPairs("""",DocID,""Dat,Tim,Stat,Source,DocType,Kontr,Rem,User1"",source);",! Write "docstr.ClassName=ClassName+""Items"";",! Write "docstr.attachEvent(""onAddColumns"",loadgoods2)",! Write "docstr.LoadHeadersXML(""Doc,DocType"");",! Write "}",! Write !,"function loadgoods2(){",! Write "if(DocID!=""""){",! Write "docstr.loadfrommethod(""Docs.Action.GetStrFromDoc"",DocID,2,3)}",! Write "else{docstr.loadfrommethod(""Docs.Action.tovsforotchet"",Kontr,2,3)}",! Write "}",! Write !,"function startFun(){",! Write "var xmldoc=PropTable.GetXmlContent();",! Write "xmldoc=addnode(xmldoc,""Rem"",remdoc+""@Docs.Remont"")",! Write "xmldoc=addnode(xmldoc,""Kontr"",Kontr+""@Common.Kontragent"")",! Write "var xmldoc2=docstr.GetXmlContent();",! Write "var ok=SplitSendXml("""",ClassName,xmldoc,xmldoc2,"""_(%session.SessionId)_""");",! Write "if(isNaN(ok)){",! Write " alert(ok);",! Write "}",! Write "else{",! Write " if(source!=""""){",! Write " var ok="_($case(%session.BrokerImplementation,1:"cspRunServerMethod",2:"cspHttpServerMethod",:"cspSelectServerMethod"))_"('"_(..Encrypt($listbuild("Docs.Action.SetSourceDoc:csp.otchdoc"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""))_"',ClassName,ok,source)",! Write " if(isNaN(ok))alert(ok)",! Write " }",! Write " returnValue=1;",! Write " window.close();",! Write "}",! Write "}",! Write !,"function addtovars(){",! Write "WinResult=window.showModalDialog(""selectgoods2.csp"","""",""cener:yes;status:no;dialogHeight:700px;dialogWidth:800px;resizable:yes;"")",! Write "if(WinResult==null)return",! Write "WinResult=WinResult.split(StringSplitter)",! Write "var FieldCaption = new Array();",! Write "var FieldValue = new Array();",! Write "for(i=0 ; i<WinResult.length-1 ; i++){",! Write " var onestr=WinResult[i].split(InnerSplitter);",! Write " FieldCaption[""Goods""]=onestr[1];",! Write " FieldValue[""Goods""]=onestr[0];",! Write " FieldCaption[""Price""]=getPrice(FieldValue[""Goods""]);",! Write " FieldCaption[""goodssource""]=2;",! Write !," docstr.AddRow(FieldCaption,FieldValue);",! Write "}",! Write "}",! Write !,"function getPrice(tovid){",! Write "return "_($case(%session.BrokerImplementation,1:"cspRunServerMethod",2:"cspHttpServerMethod",:"cspSelectServerMethod"))_"('"_(..Encrypt($listbuild("Goods.GoodsAction.getprice:csp.otchdoc"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""))_"',tovid);",! Write "}",! Write !,"function setsumm(){",! Write "var val=docstr.Total;",! Write "var val=val.toFixed(2);",! Write "PropTable.setCellValue(""Summa"",val);",! Write "}",! Write !,"</script>" Write !,(..HyperEventHead()) Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html XMLNS:SKLADz XMLNS:SKLAD2 XMLNS:SKLADList>" Write !,"<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLADz"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/treeview.htc"">",! Write "<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLAD2"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/table.htc"">",! Write "<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLADList"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/listview.htc"">",! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
